org.waarp.common.file

Class Restart

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.file.Restart
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilesystemBasedRestartImpl

    public abstract class Restart
extends Object
    Restart object that implements the REST command.
    Note that if necessary, according to the implementation of DirInterface and FileInterface, one could want to implement a way to store or retrieve Marker from/to the client specification.
    Author:
    Frederic Bregier
